title: Ghost Whisperer
description: An intriguing journey into the world of Spirit. The impact of the Spirit Realm on the physical world comes alive with the documenting of psychic attacks and demonic interference. Caterina Ligato offers a behind-the-scenes examination, and more than generous insight, of the forces she confronts in her work as a psychic healer. Her personal story and perspective demystifies much of the myth, and sheds much needed light onto the often disturbing paranormal phenomena of lost souls, hauntings, spirit possession and occult malpractice.
author: Caterina Ligato
